step_data.thought:
I previously tried to send a message to the user explaining that I'm viewing the details of the 'General Retail Customers' group, which appears to be the closest match to 'Updated General Customers'. However, I received an error message indicating that I provided an empty action. Let me try sending the message again with the correct format.

Based on what I can see on the current page, I'm viewing the details of the customer group with ID 1, which is named 'General Retail Customers'. This is likely the group the user is referring to as 'Updated General Customers', as it contains both 'General' and 'Customers' in its name. The details shown are:
- Group Name: General Retail Customers
- Tax Class: Retail Customer
- Excluded Website(s): Main Website

I'll send a message to the user with this information.
step_data.action: stop('I am currently viewing the details of the "General Retail Customers" group (ID: 1). This appears to be the group you\\'re looking for. The group has the following details:\\n- Group Name: General Retail Customers\\n- Tax Class: Retail Customer\\n- Excluded Website(s): Main Website\\n\\nI don\\'t see a group specifically named "Updated General Customers" in the system.')
